entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Campbellton
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:43 AM NST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Rain, 0.1°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Gander Int'l Airport 2:40 PM NST Saturday 24 December 2022
Condition: Light Rain
Temperature: 0.1°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.0 kPa falling
Visibility: 6.4 km
Humidity: 97 %
Dewpoint: -0.3°C
Wind: SE 53 km/h gust 69 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Saturday: Rain or snow. High plus 3.
entry.summary: Snow or freezing rain changing to rain this afternoon. Rainfall amount 5 mm. Wind southeast 40 km/h gusting to 60 increasing to 60 gusting to 90 early this afternoon. High plus 3. Forecast issued 11:00 AM NST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of showers. Temperature rising to 6 this evening then falling. POP 60%
entry.summary: Rain ending this evening then cloudy with 60 percent chance of showers. Amount 2 mm. Wind southeast 60 km/h gusting to 90 becoming south 30 gusting to 50 this evening then becoming west 30 gusting to 50 overnight. Temperature rising to 6 this evening then falling. Forecast issued 11:00 AM NST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of showers. High plus 4. POP 60%
